column5: Relax in this 2 bed (2 Queens) 2 bath condo facing the Laguna Madre! This 2nd story unit provides a beautiful view from the living area and balcony. Bring your boat and take advantage of the private boatslip. Wifi, cable, and dvd players provided. The new Schlitterbahn Waterpark is right up the road and the beach is minutes away! Washer and dryer are onsite. Perfect place for a weekend getaway to the beach or a summertime retreat.
column8: PUENTE VISTA, UNIT 217 2 BED 2 BATH - CANAL FRONT
